content.rendered:
As experts in marine construction our engineers and naval architects will undertake the role of Owner’s Engineer or Project Manager, acting as an extension to the client’s project team.

We can provide site supervision at the shipyards, witness factory tests co-ordinate and monitor sea trials.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Construction Supervision & Offshore Project Management
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our project management team monitor the project to ensure that it is carried out in accordance with the contract, the specifications, Client’s expectations, flag and Class requirements.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Offshore Transportation & Installation Services
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Our T&I department consists of project managers, naval architects, structural engineers, field engineers and master mariners. The team has many years of experience within the offshore industry, and in locations such as China, S.E. Asia, Middle East and Nigeria.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Gary Murray | Principal Surveyor
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hong Kong | +852 9829 9230Discipline: Engineer / Naval ArchitectSpecialism: Naval Architecture, New construction, Class survey and Marine Casualty InvestigationsExpert Witness Expertise: Expert opinion

jetpack-related-posts.title: Uluc Morek | Marine Engineer | Naval Architect
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Istanbul | +90 530 445 1886Discipline: Engineer / Naval ArchitectSpecialism: Accident investigation and casualty managementExpert Witness Expertise: Investigations, expert opinions
